1102:802: kvacinniṣiddhamapi sattvārthaviśeṣaṃ prajñācakṣuṣā paśyataḥ karaṇīyatayā anujñātaṃ bhagavatā|
1102:805: api tu kṛpāloḥ karuṇāprakarṣapravṛttitayā tatparatantrasya parārthaikarasasya svaprayojanavimukhasya|
1102:815: yathoktaṃ prākūtatra dvividhaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ satatabhaiṣajyaṃ glānapratyayabhaiṣajyaṃ ca|
1102:817: tadarthaṃ piṇḍāya gocare caratā grāmapraveśe yathoktaśikṣāyāṃ smṛtimādhāya caritavyam|
1102:818: tato labdhāt piṇḍapātāt caturthabhāgavibhaktāt vinipātagatānanāthavratasthān saṃvibhāginaḥ kuryāt|
1102:822: sa paribhuñjāno na raktaḥ paribhuṅkte asaktaḥ,
1102:827: tathā ca paribhuṅkte yathā nātisaṃlikhito bhavati,
1102:832: tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣābhimukhena bhavitavyam|
1102:835: paribhuñjatā ca evaṃ manasikāra utpādayitavyaḥ-santi asmin kāye aśītikṛmikulasahasrāṇi,
1102:854: glānabhaiṣajyaṃ tu yāmikaṃ sāptāhikaṃ yāvajjīvikamiti trividham|
1102:863: uktaṃ ca bodhisattvapratimokṣe-sacetpunaḥ kaścidāgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta,
1102:866: sacetpunastasya ūnaṃ tricīvaraṃ bhavet yanniśritya brahmacaryāvāsaḥ,
1102:871: na tena alpecchatā āsevitā bhavet| iti||
1102:881: yasmādanenaiva sukumāropakrameṇa saṃvardhamānaḥ śīghrameva sattvānāṃ hitasukhasaṃpādanasamartho bhavati||
1102:887: atyārabdhena hi vīryeṇa svaparahitārthasya bādhā syāt|
1102:888: samapravṛtte punarāśaye svaparātmano'tirikte vā na niṣidhyate|
1102:890: adhikasattvārthaśaktestulyaśaktervā bodhisattvasya adhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāviti siddhaṃ bhavati|
1102:891: idameva ca saṃdhāya bodhisattvaprātimokṣe'bhihitam-yastu khalu punaḥ śāriputra abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvo bodhyaṅgairabhiyuktaḥ,
1102:897: yaśca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnaparipūrṇāni tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
1102:898: yaśca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisattvaḥ ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayet,
1102:902: yasya punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaveddhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ,
1102:904: tatraivāha-yastu khalu punaḥ śāriputra anabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvaḥ,
1102:907: anyathā hi ekasattvārthasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ sattvarāśestasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvāśayaparikarmāntarāyānmahato'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syāditi||
1102:918: dharmaṃ nirgaurave svasthe na śiroveṣṭite vadet|
1102:922: niṣiddhaṃ caitadbhagavatā iti tadājñātikrame sāpattiko bhavet|
1102:940: tādṛśaṃ ca dharmamalpeṣu asaṃskṛtabuddhiṣu hīnādhimuktiṣu vā na vadediti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ|
1102:941: na mātṛgrāmasya ekākī rahogato dharmaṃ vadet|
1102:945: śrāvakayānabhāṣiteṣu vā mahāyānabhāṣiteṣu vā dharmeṣu tulyaṃ cittaprasādādikaṃ kuryāt|
1102:949: gambhīrodāradharmabhājanaṃ ca sattvaṃ nimittajñairjñātvā na śrāvakayānādidharmeṣvavatārayet|
1102:950: na ca ācāraṃ śikṣāsaṃvarakaraṇīyatāṃ muktvā sūtrāntādipāṭhenaiva tava śuddhirbhaviṣyati iti dharmakāmaṃ prabhāvayet|
1102:951: āha cātra-punaraparo'nartho ratnakūṭe dṛṣṭaḥ-aparipāciteṣu sattveṣu viśvāso bodhisattvaskhalitam|
1102:954: āryasarvadharmavaipulyasaṃgrahe sūkṣmo'pyanartha uktaḥ-sūkṣmaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ saddharmapratikṣepakarmāvaraṇam|
1102:955: yo hi kaścinmañjuśrīḥ tathāgatabhāṣite dharme kasmiṃścit śobhanasaṃjñāṃ karoti,
1102:962: āryākāśagarbhasūtre ca mūlāpattiprastāve coktam-punaraparamādikarmiko bodhisattvaḥ keṣāṃcidevaṃ vakṣyati-kiṃ bhoḥ prātimokṣavinayena ?
1102:963: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayasva|
1102:965: yatte kiṃcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayādakuśalaṃ karma samudānītam,
1102:971: neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeścāpi garhitam||91||
1102:973: jale sthale bhogye upabhogye mūtrapurīṣāderapi kutsitam|
1102:981: dvāvapi bāhū samamekasmin kāle na mardayet|
1102:989: lokāprasādakaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca varjayet||93||
1102:991: tat sarva dṛṣṭvā śāstre vyavahāre vā|
1102:994: anenaitaddarśitaṃ bhavati-dṛṣṭe'pi yadbādhākaramevaṃvidhaṃ tadvarjayet āpattirbhavatīti| yaduktam-
1102:1004: sa sarvasattvānurakṣayā ātmanaśca bodhisaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ samyagīryāpatho bhavati,
1102:1005: mṛdubhāṇī mandabhāṇī asaṃsargabahulaḥ pravivekābhimukhaḥ suprasannamukhaḥ iti||
1102:1040: na ca pārśvasukham anyatra yāvadevaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai iti|
1102:1052: rātriṃdivaṃ ca triskandhaṃ triṣkālaṃ ca pravartayet|
1102:1059: athavā, saṃcitya kṛtā yāḥ pratikṛtāḥ tābhyo'nyāḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣeṇa asaṃprajānatā vā kṛtāḥ|
1102:1060: tāsāṃ praśamaḥ pratikaraṇaṃ tena triskandhaparivartanena bodhicittasya jinānāṃ ca bhagavatāṃ samāśrayaṇācca||
1102:1063: caturbhirmaitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpamabhibhavati|
1102:1069: tatra vidūṣaṇāsamudācāraḥ akuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā vipratisārarūpātsavigarhaṇā pāpadeśanā,
1102:1078: ebhirmaitreya caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpamabhibhavatīti||
1102:1079: viśeṣatastu bodhisattvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ ladhvīnāṃ ca deśanā āryopāliparipṛcchāyāmuktāḥ|
1102:1081: sarvāpattayo bodhisattvena pañcatriṃśatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike rātriṃdivamekākinā deśayitavyāḥ|
1102:1082: tatreyaṃ deśanā- ahamevaṃnāmā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmītyārabhya yāvat saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi,
1102:1084: namo vajrapramardine ityārabhya yāvat upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ|
1102:1085: iti vistaramuktvāha-iti hi śāriputra bodhisattvena imān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatathāgatānugatairmanasikāraiḥ pāpaviśuddhiḥ kāryā|
1102:1086: tasyaivaṃ pāpaviśuddhasya ta eva buddhā bhagavanto mukhānyupadarśayanti|
1102:1088: na tat śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanikāyairāpattikaukṛtyasthānaṃ viśodhayituṃ yadbodhisattvasteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ triskandhakadharmaparyāyapravartanena āpattikaukṛtyānniḥsarati,
1102:1096: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatim|
1102:1097: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃllabhanti te||
1102:1101: yā avasthāḥ prapadyeta svayaṃ paravaśo'pi vā|
1102:1102: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ||99||
1102:1105: na hi tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ|
1102:1106: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ||100||
1102:1107: yasmāt sarvākāraṃ sarvavastutattvamadhigamya sarveṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānārthamudyacchadbhirbuddhasutaiḥ na tadasti kiṃcit,
1102:1119: kiṃcit sattvānāmeva saṃsāraduḥkhapatitānāṃ tato niḥsaraṇāya sarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet||
1102:1122: sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe'pi na tyajet|
1102:1127: caturdharmakasūtre'pyuktam- kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāvajjīvaṃ na tyaktavyamapi jīvitahetoriti|
1102:1134: yathoktamāryagaṇḍavyūhe āryaśrīsaṃbhavena-kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu|
1102:1148: ātmani ca te kulaputra āturasaṃjñotpādayitavyā kalyāṇamitreṣu ca vaidyasaṃjñā,
1102:1155: yaduktaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇāditi [śikṣā. sa. kā.-6],
1102:1169: āryākāśagarbhasūtre kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pañca mūlāpattayo nirdiṣṭāḥ|
1102:1171: tathā ādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya aṣṭau mūlāpattaya iti|
1102:1172: tathā ca tatroktam-pañca kulaputra kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya mūlāpattayaḥ yābhirmūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhoṣayati|
1102:1175: yaḥ kulaputra kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ staupikaṃ vastu apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasaṃghe niryātitaṃ vā,
1102:1190: ādikarmikāṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca aṣṭau mūlāpattayaḥ,
1102:1191: yāmirmūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāropitānītyādi pūrvavat|
1102:1193: ye sattvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunā asmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke utpannāḥ,
1102:1195: yāvat, teṣāmidaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ yāvadvistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti|
1102:1196: te hi akṛtaśramā bālapṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta utrasyanti,
1102:1201: tasmādbodhisattvena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāmāśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāmanupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyeti|
1102:1202: sopāyāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervinivartya hīnayāne parasya cittamutpādayato dvitīyā|
1102:1203: prātimokṣaśikṣāsaṃvaraṃ vihāya mahāyāne cittotpādamātreṇa tatpaṭhanena cāsya śuddhiprakāśanāt tṛtīyā|
1102:1213: kṣatriyasya purohitāmātyacaṇḍālairye bhikṣavo daṇḍitā arthadaṇḍena sāṃghikaṃ staupikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā dravyamapahṛtya tebhya evopanāmayanti|
1102:1220: āsāṃ ca mūlāpattīnāṃ sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ śāstrakāropadarśitāḥ saṃgrahakārikā ucyante-
1102:1258: nānāsūtraikadeśānāṃ vā samuccayamebhireva kṛtaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa paśyet vyavalokayet granthato'rthato vā|
1102:1261: āryanāgārjunapādairnibaddhaṃ dvitīyaṃ śikṣāsamuccayaṃ sūtrasamuccayaṃ ca paśyet prayatnataḥ ādarataḥ|
1102:1265: yato nivāryate yatra yadeva ca niyujyate|
1102:1289: yatkāyāvasthāyāḥ cittāvasthāyāśca sarveryāpatheṣu pratyavekṣā nirūpaṇaṃ sarvavāraṃ yathā pratipāditaṃ prāk||
1102:1290: sarvametaduktaśikṣākauśalaṃ karmaṇā niṣpādayitavyaṃ na vacanamātreṇeti niyamayitumāha-
1102:1291: kāyenaiva paṭhiṣyāmi vākpāṭhena tu kiṃ bhavet|
1102:1296: na tu śabdamātraghoṣaṇayā niṣphalatvāditi bodhisattvena yatitavyam|
1102:1297: kathamiva ? vaidyakaśāstrādhyayanamātreṇa tatkriyāmakurvato vyādhigrastasya kiṃ phalaṃ niṣpatsyate ?
